query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report_jobs) as total_tasks,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report_jobs WHERE status = 'pending') as pending,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report_jobs WHERE status = 'submitted') as submitted,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report_jobs WHERE status = 'completed') as completed,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report_jobs WHERE status = 'failed') as failed;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user GdNjKxkKZgeVtwE.root --database 5MUJ5aHkiAehb9iTzNdxTq --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report_jobs) as total_tasks,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report_jobs WHERE status = 'pending') as pending,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report_jobs WHERE status = 'submitted') as submitted,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report_jobs WHERE status = 'completed') as completed,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM report_jobs WHERE status = 'failed') as failed;
